title: Tweet Generation App
description: A Generative AI powered Tweet Generation App built with Python, Streamlit, and Google’s Gemini 2.0, enabling users to generate structured, safe, and on-topic tweets.

title: Personal Portfolio
description: A React SPA portfolio showcasing backend engineering, system design, and Generative AI work. Features 3D animations, dark/light mode, OG generator, SEO, and Vercel deployment.

title: Backend Optimization & Modernization
description: Refactored and modernized core backend modules, optimized queries, and improved pagination performance for high-traffic distributed systems.
